fields.name: Religious
fields.description: Newspapers published by churches and religious organizations or publications intended for a particular denomination or religious community.

fields.name: Community
fields.description: Newspapers published for the general population or for the citizens of a city, county, or region.

fields.name: School
fields.description: Newspapers published by a secondary school, college, or university in Georgia.

fields.name: African American
fields.description: Newspapers published by and for the African American community.

fields.name: Paper of Record
fields.description: Newspapers published by churches and religious organizations or publications intended for a particular denomination or religious community.

fields.name: LGBTQ
fields.description: Newspapers published by and for the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, and queer/questioning communities.

fields.name: Native American
fields.description: Newspapers published by and for Native American communities.
